content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to personal information or interviews with Bada to know exactly what inspired her shift towards the more organic and natural image. However, based on research, it seems that Bada's interest in a more natural and organic image is reflective of a broader trend among Korean celebrities towards a more holistic and health-conscious lifestyle. 

In recent years, many Korean celebrities have focused on promoting natural beauty and healthy living, which has led to a shift towards more natural-looking makeup, hairstyles, and clothing. Bada seems to be part of this trend, embracing a more organic and earthy aesthetic that focuses on highlighting natural beauty and individuality.

Additionally, Bada has spoken openly about her struggles with depression and anxiety in the past, which may have contributed to her desire for a more relaxed and natural image. She has talked about the healing power of nature and meditation, suggesting that her new look may be part of her ongoing journey towards self-care and wellness.
